trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Delete Data Disk</languageKeyword> operation removes the specified data disk from a Virtual Machine.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Delete Data Disk</languageKeyword> operation removes the specified data disk from a Virtual Machine.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Delete Data Disk</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Delete Data Disk</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the subscription ID, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;cloudservice-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the cloud service, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;deployment-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the deployment, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;role-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the Virtual Machine, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;lun%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the logical unit number of the disk to delete.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the subscription ID, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;cloudservice-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the cloud service, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;deployment-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the deployment, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;role-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the Virtual Machine, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;lun%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the logical unit number of the disk to delete.

trans-unit.source: You can find the LUN that is assigned to the disk by using <externalLink><linkText>Get Role</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj157193.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: You can find the LUN that is assigned to the disk by using <externalLink><linkText>Get Role</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj157193.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.
trans-unit.target: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.

trans-unit.source: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.
trans-unit.target: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the source blob for the disk should also be deleted from storage.
trans-unit.target: Specifies that the source blob for the disk should also be deleted from storage.

trans-unit.source: The <parameterReference>comp=media</parameterReference> parameter is only available using version 2013-08-01 and higher.
trans-unit.target: The <parameterReference>comp=media</parameterReference> parameter is only available using version 2013-08-01 and higher.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the request headers.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the request headers.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: This header should be set to <userInput>2012-03-01</userInput> or higher.
trans-unit.target: This header should be set to <userInput>2012-03-01</userInput> or higher.

trans-unit.source: For more information about versioning headers, see <externalLink><linkText>Service Management Versioning</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/gg592580.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about versioning headers, see <externalLink><linkText>Service Management Versioning</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/gg592580.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code and a set of response headers.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code and a set of response headers.

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 202 (Accepted).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 202 (Accepted).

trans-unit.source: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="10f8d244-4649-4063-b6c9-7a20765513fa" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="10f8d244-4649-4063-b6c9-7a20765513fa" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: The response for this operation includes the following headers.
trans-unit.target: The response for this operation includes the following headers.

trans-unit.source: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.

trans-unit.source: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the management service.
trans-unit.target: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the management service.

trans-unit.source: You can also use the following resources to remove a data disk from a Virtual Machine:
trans-unit.target: You can also use the following resources to remove a data disk from a Virtual Machine:

trans-unit.source: Remove a data disk from a virtual machine
trans-unit.target: Remove a data disk from a virtual machine

trans-unit.source: How to Detach a Disk from a Virtual Machine
trans-unit.target: How to Detach a Disk from a Virtual Machine
